entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:11 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: E 16 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Fog patches overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
